home.title: Hi, my name is
home.name: justrunis
home.description: I'm a software developer based in Kaunas, Lithuania. I'm passionate about technology and I love to learn new things. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a professional.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have made.
projects.projectDescription1: A virtual car showroom built with React
projects.projectDescription2: A quiz game built with React
projects.projectDescription3: A frontend interface for Wuthering Waves game API
projects.projectDescription4: A simple weather app built with React
projects.projectDescription8: Web app for finding products to buy or sell

about.title: About me
about.bio: I am a passionate software developer with a strong interest in building responsive, user-friendly web applications. With experience in both frontend and backend development, I am comfortable working with a variety of technologies and frameworks. I am always eager to learn new things and take on new challenges. I am currently looking for opportunities to work on exciting projects and grow as a professional.
about.jobDescription1: I am currently working in Kaunas university of technology as a project technician. I have to maintain and develop the MOODLE platform and other web applications.
